title: ISic001478. epitaph of Brachidas
body:
1Βραχύ-
2δ̣α̣ εἰμί   ←

1ΒΡΑΧΥ
2..ΕΙΜΙ  ←

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Orsi, Dubois, Guarducci, Brugnone;
  • line.2: Pugliese Carratelli: ..

English translation

Jonathan Prag

I am (the marker) of Brachidas

commentary
